title: What is the best DJ software for a Mac? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many options in the market both for MAC compatible DJ softwares. Traktor Pro and Serato DJ, are the two most popular softwares. Those two softwares are compatible with both WIN and MAC OS. Traktor and Serato are professional DJ softwares but with an amazingly easy interface that is very easy to learn by beginners. There are other options out there and a great deal is the Mixxx. It features a powerful DJ mixer with FX slots and a music library that integrated with iTunes to import and organize your lists. You can find more details and the best 5 DJ softwares for you to pick: The best DJ software for mixing - Global Djs Guide

There are a lot of good programs out there. Traktor Pro is good, so are Pioneer RekordBox, Serato DJ and DJay Pro. Virtual DJ is also widely used but I haven’t tried any of the latest versions What works for you is not only based on the software, but also on the hardware you use. Some software will only work with certain controllers. Most software manufacturers offer free trial versions. Try a few and see what works for you
